name: LUMINOUS LEGENDS: MEGA EYE SHADOW PALETTE
about: What it is:A dazzling limited-edition eyeshadow palette featuring a mesmerizing spectrum of richly pigmented gemstone shades and radiant finishes...Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, phthalates, and sulfates SLS & SLES. These products are also cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Inspired by the captivating allure of precious gems, the paletteu2019s elegant shades and opulent finishes glide on seamlessly, offering beautiful blendability with intense color payoff. Masterfully curated to elevate your makeup looks, PAT McGRATH LABSu2019 limited-edition jewel unlocks infinite possibilities for this holiday season and beyond..This Palette Contains:.Palette Size:126mmWx 13mmH x 99mmL (full size)

how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Sublime Mattes (Coral Caress, Rose Afterglow, Sunkissed Rose, and Sable Seductress):.-Achieve flawless eye definition by sculpting and shaping your eyes with these velvety matte shades..-Utilize a small blending brush to accentuate the upper and lower lash lines and add dimension to the eye socket. ..Gleaming Metallic (Golden Muse, Lunar Luxury, Honey Nectar, and Lilac Lustre):.-Elevate your eye look with the radiant sheen of metallic luminosity, creating a gleaming chromatic effect..-Sweep these shades across the center of your lids, brow bones, or inner corners to bring a captivating glow to your eyes...Sparkle Metallic (Stardust Peony, Flame Fatale, Orchid Opulence, and Celestial Cerulean):.-Unleash your creativity with these sparkling metallic shades, designed to deliver mesmerizing, multidimensional effects..-Apply with your fingertip or a dense brush to adorn your lids, inner corners, or lash lines with a touch of sparkle and shine...Metallic Shimmer (Golden Bronze, Bordeaux Brilliance, and Moonlight Mist):.-Enhance your eyes with sophisticated luminosity, ideal for creating looks that range from timeless elegance to daring individuality..-Use a fluffy brush to blend a wash of color over your entire lid or intensify the look with your fingertip for added drama.
